name: acclimation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of changing to suit different conditions of life, weather, etc., or the act of making someone or something do this: Athletes training in hot weather routinely go through a process called heat acclimation. After a period of acclimation, I deleted the old apps and moved over completely to the new system. Related word
acclimate
More examplesFewer examplesThe climber has a day-by-day plan for acclimation on the mountain.All three species of fish demonstrated very poor survival at 4℃ and no capacity for acclimation.He spent four years in Europe, where the acclimation to culture and climate was difficult. Your pet's favourite blanket and toys will help with the acclimation process when you move.
